extendedInfo.description: Create flashcards with images, formulas & tables on CoboCards.com. Download them onto your device and study on the go.As a Free-User you can: - Study by status (5 boxes)- Study sorted/shuffled- Evaluate your answer- Flip through flashcards- Sync status with CoboCards.com- Upgrade to Pro versionAs a Pro-User you can additionally: - Search for specific flashcards- Create and display folders- Create new flashcard sets- Create, edit & delete flashcards- Study with Leitner algorithm- Extend Pro membershipExample flashcards are available in the App.

reviews.title: Best flashcard app!
reviews.comment: I tried a few others, and this one has all the features I need: pictures, lists, support for LaTex formulas, and printing. Developers are helpful and fast to respond to any issue. Also I love that I can manage/edit cards from the browser on any pc, as well as study the cards there too, for times when my phone is low on battery.
reviews.author: Jen Rotteveel

reviews.comment: use ankidroid instead. it is free and support upload image
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Con
reviews.comment: This is not free as advertised on life hacker, it\'s a scam. You have to pay within the app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Best flashcard app for smartphones. easy usability and practicable options. quick and helpful support (if needed). TOP
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Non refundable, you pay the price of the app plus 3.50 a month to create card sets online. Ripoff, good app tho
reviews.author: A Google User
